name: Tower
description: Tower is the native DEX on Babylon Genesis - powering swaps, liquidity, and incentives for Bitcoin and BTCFi assets.

name: Escher
description: Escher Finance is a decentralized platform for liquid staking across multiple chains. It integrates with protocols like Babylon to enable secure, cross-chain staking. Users earn rewards through the ePoints system by participating in the ecosystem.

name: Cube by SatLayer
description: Cube by SatLayer is the liquid staking platform for BABY on Babylon Genesis, part of the SatLayer restaking protocol.
